events_categories.title: Events in Climate and Resilience
events_categories.description: ICF International is a global consulting firm that specializes in climate and sustainability. They offer a wide range of services including climate policy and planning, global climate consulting, climate communications, and custom climate risk analytics to help organizations prepare for existing and future global climate challenges.

events_categories.title: Events in Digital Transformation
events_categories.description: To meet your enterprise goals in the digital age, you need a partner that understands your business context and knows how to develop systems—quickly—to help you deliver on your mission

events_categories.title: Events in Encouraging Participation and Engagement
events_categories.description: We’ve sent candy sales soaring, smoking rates plummeting, and raised an entire nation’s GDP. Our experts will help you overcome barriers and take advantage of the breakneck pace of change

allEvents.title: Climate policy and planning
allEvents.description: Our experts can help you assess your climate risks and opportunities, engage your stakeholders, and integrate climate adaptation into your long-term planning and operations.

allEvents.title: Global climate action
allEvents.description: Better prepare for existing—and future—global climate challenges with our objective insight, scientifically sound analysis, and multidisciplinary expertise.

allEvents.title: Climate communications
allEvents.description: We offer climate education, awareness, and engagement that presents new findings and empowers positive change.

allEvents.title: Scaled Delivery
allEvents.description: Our Digital Services Center (DSC) provides patterns for enterprise delivery including practices and tenets that can be tailored to your specific needs.

allEvents.title: Agile Engineering
allEvents.description: Combine engineering methods, processes, and tools with rapid prototyping to construct, maintain, and integrate platforms.

allEvents.title: Rapid implementation
allEvents.description: Reduce implementation time, operating cost, and licensing costs to rapidly build agile applications that address unique business needs, span functional silos, and improve performance.

allEvents.title: Integrated Comms
allEvents.description: Our unique approach to integrated communications ignites Participation through culturally relevant storytelling, transformative ideas, unforgettable campaigns, and connected experiences. We help you create moments that matter—building armies of brand fans and advocates.

allEvents.title: Loyalty and CRM
allEvents.description: We believe that loyalty is more than just points and programs. Through a powerful combination of customer and industry strategy and insights, data science, and technology, we design and deliver award-winning loyalty, CRM, and experience solutions. We innovate alongside you—building experiences that cultivate deep emotional loyalty, advocacy, and a shared identity with your brand.

allEvents.title: Business Transformation
allEvents.description: We help our clients navigate complex business challenges through our customer-centered approach. Our expert teams guide you in transforming your values, structures, operations, technology, and culture to obsessively focus on your target audiences. By designing and driving best-in-class experiences, we prove measurable impact in helping your business transform to meet enterprise-wide objectives.
